title.rendered: A Customs Brokerage: Extending Our Commitment to Service

content.rendered:
[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.14.7″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”0px|||||” da_disable_devices=”off|off|off” global_colors_info=”{}” da_is_popup=”off” da_exit_intent=”off” da_has_close=”on” da_alt_close=”off” da_dark_close=”off” da_not_modal=”on” da_is_singular=”off” da_with_loader=”off” da_has_shadow=”on”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.14.7″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.14.7″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.14.7″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”Montserrat||||||||” text_font_size=”17px” global_colors_info=”{}”]

At A Customs Brokerage, service has always been more than a promise, it’s the foundation upon which our company was built. From the onset, our founders envisioned a company that would not only excel in logistics but also serve as a force for good, spreading positivity wherever possible. This commitment has taken shape in various ways, from our Concierge Service, which offers unparalleled customer care, to our involvement in charitable initiatives like Sneaker Impact, Catholic Charities, Missionaries of Charity, and now, our newest partnership with BLUE Missions.

Our connection to BLUE Missions runs deep, rooted in shared values and community ties. Many of our employees are proud alumni of Christopher Columbus High School, where the spirit of service is instilled in every student. The founder of BLUE Missions, Danny Rodriguez, is also a Columbus alumnus, and the organization often calls on the school’s students and graduates to volunteer for mission trips that bring clean water systems to communities in need. Several of our A Customs Brokerage employees have had the privilege of participating in these missions, working hands-on to provide access to clean water, access that is often a catalyst for hope and opportunity.

When BLUE Missions introduced their Water For All program, which calls on businesses to pledge direct support to this vital cause, we knew we had to be part of it. Our president Gabriel Rodriguez met with Danny and Richard Sixto, the BLUE Development Director, to explore how A Customs Brokerage could contribute meaningfully to this initiative. We’re proud to announce that A Customs Brokerage has pledged to donate a percentage of revenue from every shipment we handle to support BLUE Missions’ efforts. These contributions will go towards critical projects like installing sustainable water systems in underserved communities, creating sanitation stations, and furthering the education on the cause worldwide, ensuring that more people have access to the life-sustaining resource that many of us take for granted.

Through this partnership, we are extending our purpose of service even further, and we hope that our actions will inspire others to join us in making a difference. When businesses and individuals come together with a shared mission, we can achieve remarkable things.

 

Learn more about how you can support this initiative and the incredible work being done by BLUE Missions here.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
